data.text: @peripatesis @ITweetMuseums Oh I like this! When I saw Whistler’s Mother in person I was so surprised that it was fairly big—had always assumed it was a rather small piece.
@peripatesis @ITweetMuseums @artsmia collection pages have a helpful baseball/tennis ball for this purpose.
@peripatesis The @brooklynmuseum does some version of this, although not within a gallery context. https://t.co/PwUdoOFgoO
@peripatesis ArtsConnectEd has this feature (on object size) and I loved it. It’s possible that the Walker and MIA do that now with their collections, https://t.co/yaRdPAUYos
